titles.title: Electing a Member to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
Electing a Member to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Larson (CT) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects a specified named Member to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
